hero.title: Barka da zuwa AFRILingua
hero.subtitle: Ƙarfafa harsunan Afirka ta hanyar mulkin gudanarwa
hero.description: Ku shiga DAO ɗinmu don kiyayewa, tallatawa, da haɓaka harsunan Afirka ta amfani da fasahar blockchain da shirye-shiryen al'umma.

register.title: Shiga AFRILingua DAO
register.subtitle: Zaɓi matsayinka kuma fara ba da gudummawa ga kiyayewar harsunan Afirka

form.success: Rajista ta yi nasara! Za mu tuntuɓe ku nan ba da jimawa ba.
form.error: An sami kuskure. Don Allah sake gwadawa.

coreTeam.title: Memba na Ƙungiyar Asali
coreTeam.description: Jagoranci shirye-shiryen dabarun kuma tura hangen nesa na DAO gaba.

ambassador.title: Jakadan
ambassador.description: Wakilci AFRILingua a cikin al'ummarka kuma yada wayar da kan jama'a.

validator.title: Mai tabbatarwa
validator.description: Tabbatar da abun cikin harshe kuma tabbatar da ƙa'idodin inganci.

contributor.title: Mai ba da gudummawa
contributor.description: Ba da albarkatun harshe, fassarori, da abun ciki.

technicalPlayer.title: Mai aikin fasaha
technicalPlayer.description: Gina kayan aiki, ababen more rayuwa, da mafita na fasaha.

hero.title: Game da AFRILingua DAO
hero.subtitle: Kiyayewa da ƙarfafa harsunan Afirka don tsararraki masu zuwa

mission.title: Manufa Mu
mission.description: AFRILingua DAO ƙungiya ce mai cin gashin kanta wacce ke sadaukar da kai don kiyayewa, raya, da ƙarfafa harsunan Afirka ta hanyar fasahar blockchain da mulkin al'umma.
mission.statement: Don tabbatar da cewa kowane yaren Afirka yana bunƙasa a zamanin dijital, haɗa al'ummomi da kiyaye al'adun gargajiya don tsararraki masu zuwa.

vision.title: Hangaren Mu
vision.description: Muna hasashen makoma inda harsunan Afirka za su kasance cikakke na dijital, samuwa, kuma suna bunƙasa a fagen duniya.

pillar1.title: Kiyayewar Dijital
pillar1.description: Ƙirƙiri cikakken rumbunan dijital na harsunan Afirka, gami da rubutattun rubutu, rikodin sauti, da mahallin al'ada.

pillar2.title: Samuwa Duniya
pillar2.description: Sanya harsunan Afirka samuwa ga ɗalibai a duk faɗin duniya ta hanyar fasaha da albarkatun ilimi.

stat1.title: Barazanar Harshe
stat1.description: Fiye da harsuna 2,000 na Afirka suna fuskantar halaka, da yawa ba su da yanayin dijital.

stat2.title: Asarar Al'ada
stat2.description: Tare da kowane harshe da aka rasa, muna rasa ilimin al'ada na musamman, al'adu, da ra'ayoyin duniya.

stat3.title: Albarkatu Masu Iyaka
stat3.description: Rashin kuɗi, takardu, da kayan aikin fasaha yana kawo cikas ga ƙoƙarin kiyaye harshe.

solution.title: Magani Mu
solution.description: AFRILingua DAO tana amfani da fasahar blockchain da mulkin raba don ƙirƙirar dandamali mai dorewa, na al'umma don kiyayewa da haɓaka harsunan Afirka.

feature1.title: Mulkin Raba
feature1.description: Membobin al'umma suna yanke shawara ta hanyar tsarin dimokuradiyya masu bayyanawa ta amfani da zaɓe na tushen blockchain.

feature2.title: Kayan Dijital
feature2.description: Gina cikakkun ɗakunan littattafan dijital, kayan aikin fassarar, da dandamalin koyo don harsunan Afirka.

feature3.title: Shiga Al'umma
feature3.description: Ƙarfafa masu magana na asali, masana harshe, da masu sha'awar bayar da gudummawa, tabbatar da fassarori, da yada wayar da kan jama'a.

feature4.title: Kudade Mai Dorewa
feature4.description: Yi amfani da hanyoyin kuɗi na tushen blockchain don tabbatar da dorewar dogon lokaci da adalci na biyan kuɗi ga masu ba da gudummawa.

value1.title: Kiyayewar Al'ada
value1.description: Mun yi imani cewa kowane harshe taska ce ta al'ada wanda dole ne a kiyaye shi kuma a yi bikin.

value2.title: Haɗaɗɗun
value2.description: Muna maraba da duk harsunan Afirka, yaruka, da al'ummomin harshe tare da girmamawa da goyon baya daidai.

value3.title: Ƙirƙira
value3.description: Muna rungumar fasaha mai ci gaba don magance kalubale na gargajiya a cikin kiyayewar harshe.

cta.title: Shiga Ƙungiyar
cta.description: Ka kasance ɓangare na juyin juya halin da ke kiyaye harsunan Afirka don tsararraki masu zuwa.

hero.title: Taswirar Hanyar Mu
hero.subtitle: Tsara hanyar zuwa makomar Afirka mai yawan harsuna

phase1.title: Lokaci na Tushe
phase1.description: Kafa kayan aiki na asali, tsarin mulki, da tushen al'umma na farko.

milestones.m2: Ɗaukar membobin ƙungiyar asali da jakadu
milestones.m4: Shigar da membobin al'umma 100 na farko

phase2.title: Haɓaka Abun ciki
phase2.description: Gina cikakkun albarkatun harshe da fara ƙoƙarin dijital.

milestones.m2: Ƙirƙiri ƙamus na dijital don harsuna 10+
milestones.m3: Haɓaka kayan aikin fassarar da API

phase3.title: Faɗaɗa Dandamali
phase3.description: Ƙara dandamali, gabatar da fasali masu ci gaba, da faɗaɗa ɗaukar harshe.

milestones.m1: Ƙaddamar da dandamalin koyo tare da darussan hulɗa
milestones.m3: Haɗa kayan aikin harshe masu amfani da AI

outcomes.o2: Aikace-aikacen wayar hannu don iOS da Android
outcomes.o3: Kayan aikin harshe masu haɓaka AI

phase4.title: Tasirin Duniya
phase4.description: Cimma sanin duniya da kafa AFRILingua a matsayin dandamali na farko na harsunan Afirka.

milestones.m1: Kai ga masu amfani miliyan 1 masu aiki
milestones.m2: Haɗin gwiwa tare da cibiyoyin ilimi

outcomes.o1: Al'ummar duniya na masu koyo harshe

future.title: Hangaren Dogon Lokaci
future.description: Tafiyarmu ba ta ƙare a nan ba. Muna hasashen duniya inda kowane yaren Afirka yake bunƙasa ta hanyar dijital.

goal1.title: Samuwa Duniya
goal1.description: Sanya duk harsunan Afirka samuwa ga kowa, a ko'ina cikin duniya.

goal2.title: Gadon Al'ada
goal2.description: Ƙirƙiri cikakkiyar rumbun dijital na gadon harshe na Afirka da aka taɓa tara.

goal3.title: Ƙarni na Gaba
goal3.description: Ƙarfafa tsararraki masu zuwa don haɗawa da tushen su ta hanyar fasaha.
